Indira Gandhi Scholarship for Single Gir.description: The Indira Gandhi Single Girl Child Scholarship is a government scholarship program that aims to empower girls in India through education. It was created to compensate for the direct costs of higher education for single girls. This scholarship is created for girls who are the only child of their parents.
Indira Gandhi Scholarship for Single Gir.eligiblity_criteria:
This scholarship is only available to single girl children who are enrolled in the first year of a full-time, regular PG course at a designated university or postgraduate college.
